name: Apple
description: A sweet, crisp fruit rich in fiber and vitamin C.

name: Broccoli
description: A nutrient-dense vegetable high in vitamins C and K, perfect for steaming or roasting.

name: Tomato
description: A juicy and tangy fruit often used in salads, sauces, and cooking.

name: Potato
description: A starchy root vegetable great for frying, baking, and mashing.

name: Banana
description: A soft, sweet fruit packed with potassium and ideal for snacking.

name: Orange
description: A citrus fruit high in vitamin C, known for its refreshing taste.

name: Strawberry
description: A juicy, red berry with a sweet and slightly tart flavor, rich in antioxidants.

name: Mango
description: A tropical fruit with a rich, sweet taste and a smooth texture.
